Tool

Name02: Carbon Cycle Simulation for Terrestrial Biomass
ID1
Author(c) 2003 by O.Conrad

Description

Simulation of the Carbon Cycle in Terrestrial Biomass. Reference: Hugget, R.J. (1993): 'Modelling the Human Impact on Nature', Oxford University Press.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Output
ResultsTable (output)TABLE
Options
Time SpanFloating pointTIME_SPANMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 100.000000
Time Interval [a]Floating pointTIME_STEPMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 0.100000
Net Primary Production [Gt Carbon / a]Floating pointPRIMPRODMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 27.800000
Humification FactorFloating pointCHUMIFYMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 0.400000
Carbonization FactorFloating pointCCARBONMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 0.050000
LeavesFloating pointP_LEAVMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 0.300000
BranchesFloating pointP_BRANMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 0.200000
StemsFloating pointP_STEMMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 0.300000
RootsFloating pointP_ROOTMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 0.200000
Leaves to LitterFloating pointK_LEAV_LITTMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 1.000000
Branches to LitterFloating pointK_BRAN_LITTMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 0.100000
Stems to LitterFloating pointK_STEM_LITTMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 0.033000
Roots to HumusFloating pointK_ROOT_HUMUMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 0.100000
Litter to HumusFloating pointK_LITT_HUMUMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 1.000000
Humus to CharcoalFloating pointK_HUMU_COALMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 0.100000
